name: Visendus
description:
If you get an error message (in Firefox?) try enabling third-party cookies for itch.io. This has to do with how itch.io puts the game in an iframe. Alternatively, feel free to download one of the executable options below!

Visendus is a stealth game made by roachbones and inhumanrobot for My First Game Jam Summer 2019.

You play as a prototype robot with the ability to scan entities and project a hologram to disguise yourself as those entities.

You have been awoken to help a new friend.
